original: apply filterlim_le_m_infty with (f := ln) (g := fun x => / x). - intros x Hx. unfold ln. destruct (Rlt_dec 0 x). + apply Rlt_le. apply Rinv_0_lt_compat. auto. + exfalso. apply n. auto. - apply filterlim_comp with (g := Ropp). + unfold filterlim. eapply filterlim_ext_loc. * intros y Hy. apply Ropp_involitive. * apply filterlim_Rinv_0_right. unfold Rbar_locally. exists 0%R. intros x Hx. apply Rlt_trans with (y := 0%R). apply (Ropp_lt_contravar _ _ Hx). apply Rlt_le. apply Rabs_pos. + apply filterlim_Ropp_left.
